nodes.bodyText: Should we remove warning only if the jobScheduledMap has the identifier. Just wanted to make sure we do not clear out warnings added through jobLastActivityMap

A job will be first added to jobScheduledMap when it gets scheduled. As soon as it gets assigned it will be removed from the map. As it starts building it will be added to jobLastActivityMap.
Hence, the same job identifier cannot be present in both the maps at the same time.
Therefore, I think this is a safe operation.

I get your point about how the jobs are added to the map.
Since the ScheduledJobListener#jobStatusChanged would be called for jobs which are part of jobLastActivityMap, was wondering if there will be cases where we end up clearing warnings for jobs which are in building state in this listener.
